1.content:
It's a mild, spring day in Adam Sandler's home town. In the local hospital, old Mrs. Sandler, Adam's grandmother, lies in bed. An old lady of 98, she was forced to become bed-ridden because of a weak heart.

"Adam?" asked the old lady.
"Yeah grandma?" Adam gets up and walks to the bed.
"The rest of you, leave, now!" Mrs. Sandler croaks, and Adam's mother and father leave the room.
"Adam, my favourite, darling grandson. I have something to leave you, which I did not include in my will" she says.
"What is it?" Adam asks eagerly.

Adam's grandmother points to a small, wooden box on the shelf by the window.

"That box, open it boy".
Adam opens the box. Inside is a solid gold ring, with what looks like the family crest, stamped onto it.

"That is our family heirloom" says the old lady.
"I bequeth it to you, my grandson. Be warned. It is magic. Forged many centuries ago. It will grant you any wish you want. No matter what it is. Use it wisely Adam and Adam-"
"Yes grandma?"
"Be careful when you use it, won't you, my dear?"
"Yes grandma".
"Good".
1.title: Presenting the ring...

11.content:
Three days later, Old Mrs. Sandler dies. Adam gets a week off school to attend the funeral. The church is an old one. It's white weatherboard with old, plate-glass windows. The pulpit is of an older style and in the corner, sits the church-organ.

Adam sits in a pew near the back of the church. He'd gained a bit from the ring, and now weighed 180. He looked a little more 'solid'. His arms and legs were thicker and he had the slightest hint of a double-chin. The chaplin spoke.

"All rise".

The pews creaked as everyone got up.

"Ladies and Gentlemen, Elizabeth Sandler was a sweet lady, a nice lady..." the chaplin began.

"She made good cookies!" someone called out, and everyone laughed.

"...and we shall remember her in that light. Wife to Lawrence Sandler for some 55 years, she lived a life full of wonders, fun and purpose. A nurse during the war, she and her husband served our country proudly..."

Adam looked up and saw, two pews down, his grandfather, Lawrence. Grandpa Lawrence was always a lot of fun. Laughing, joking, tickling. A 'dirty old man' he used to say. He also had an abnormal fascination with guns. Adam wouldn't have been surprised if the old man was armed at that very moment.

But now the great man was crying. His wonderful, funny, playful, lecturing, candy-giving, play-fighting, pistol-shooting grandfather, was in tears. Adam gulped and remembered what his grandma told him. The ring would grant you any wish...

Adam thought.

Under his breath he said: "I wish for grandpa to be happy again".

Suddenly, the lid of the casket on the alter creaked open. Everyone gasped!! Old Elizabeth got out of the coffin and yawned.

"What's going o-" the old woman stopped. "Oh my! Oh, no, no, no!!"

The chaplin was at a loss for words. The district doctor came running down the aisle. He felt her heartbeat, her pulse and temperature.

"She's alive!" he announced.
"But how?" The chaplin gasped.
"These things happen. They're called 'near-death experiences'" said the doctor.

Adam looked up again, to see his grandpa, running down the aisle, he scooped up his ressurrected wife and hugged her like a rag-doll!

Everyone clapped and cheered. Adam smiled to himself. Another point for getting into heaven, he thought.

1122112.content:
As he thought of his wish, Adam noticed that the house around him changed.

He now had vague memories of the time his room was moved downstairs in the new timeline. He couldn't quite recall what had moved up instead. Maybe it was a study or something.

Another thing he quickly realized was that the doors were wider than they had been before, which, given his new body, made a lot of sense.

The stuff in his room changed, too. This bed was reinforced and there was a mini fridge next to it. The games and CDs on his shelves looked different as well, but there was nothing specific he could see about that at a mere glance.

His wardrobe hadn't changed much from the outside, but its open door revealed that there were fewer clothes in it, although obviously much larger.

Once he didn't see anything else in his room that had obviously changed --- excluding the numerous wrapping papers and such that were scattered on the floor --- he decided that he should probably at last try to figure out how much had changed between the members of his family when reality shifted.

He was pleased to note that he and Richard were still good friends in this reality. Richard always made sure to bring along some food whenever he came over.

The first difference he discovered as that his younger brother, Mikey, had been pretty much raised to be a feeder for Adam in all of his two years of existence, and that his parents --- always thinking ahead --- recently had started discussing whether getting another pair of hands might be a good idea down the road. Mikey absolutely loved climbing on and playing with Adam's fat whenever he wasn't feeding him. It was Mikey's favorite toy by far. Another thing he had started doing was to try and take his naps on Adam's body, with varying degrees of success.

Meanwhile Derek, his older brother by three years, had been helping Adam move around whenever he needed to. As a consequence, he was quite buff for an eight-year-old. He also delighted in feeding Adam whenever he got the chance. He constantly bragged about his fat younger brother at school and could not understand it when other people didn't share his enthusiasm. His best friend, Julie, wasn't one of them.

In fact, when the two of them were spending time together at Adam's family's house, that meant that there was quite a high chance that they were feeding Adam. When they wanted to do something else, they headed over to Julie's house, where the mere proximity to Adam did not tempt them to abandon their games or projects to feed him.

Adam smiled looking over his ring on his hand. He was in the middle row of the old minivan his mother drove while his brothers took up the spots around him. He had privately wished they would go to the mall today and five minutes later they had gotten into the car. That kind of satisfaction was rare, but the ring had given him astounding power. A quick phone call ensured Richard would meet him at the mall.

Adam had two brothers. One was Mikey, his little, nine year old brother. He was kind of tubby, having been a little spoiled as the youngest child. He was the kind of kid that didn't have many problems getting cookies at the grocery store. Dressed in in a loose pokemon t-shirt, he didn't look fat, overweight, but the whole family knew. The other Brother was Derek. Derek was the spitting image of good health. At 15 years old, he was already playing varsity football and was coated in muscle.

A few minutes later they were al the mall, a giant two story structure that held hundreds of stores. Richard was waiting for him at the food court. Free of his family, he met up with his friend standing next to a Sonic. "Hey man, Mom gave me some money, so I'll buy your lunch today."

"Oh thanks!" Richard was in his class, but came from a family with a bit more money. "But you know my allowance is twice what yours is."

Richard had been waiting for this moment all day, and had been practicing it in his head for what felt like hours. "Well I Dont know." He pulled the twenty dollar bill out of his pocket. "I wish I had ten of these." In an instant, the single bill turned into a folded up wad of twenties. His friend's eyes lit up. Adam explained the ring while ordering them both a huge meal. "I'd like four bacon cheeseburgers with four orders of fries and tater tots, plus two of those huge things of coke you guys have." He quickly decided that from now on, all of his meal would be this large.

"Woah man you're going to eat all of that?" Richard said looking blown away.

"Well no. I mean I could. I can do anything. But part of it is for you." Adam smiled as he handed over the money. "Because I wish you were into weight gain as much as I am!" Richard looked confused for a second before his face went back to normal.

"Thanks man, you know my own parents just only ever get me one!"

121111121.content:
Suddenly the front door opened.

" Oh no!" said Adam, how could he explain that he and Richard became 300 pound 12 year olds in one day.

In walked Mikey, Adam's tubby 9 year old little brother. He closed the door, walked into the living room, saw Adam and Richard, and his eyes grew wide.

" Oh, uh, hey Mikey, whats up?" says Adam feeling nervous.

Mikey walked around to the front of the couch and poked Adam's belly.

" Wow." says Mikey in amazement," you two got big!"

" Uh yeah, I guess we did, he he." chuckles Richard nervously." You see me and your brother just ate a lot of food and our bellies are really full." Mikey looks over to Adam.

" Yeah." lies Adam.

" Oh, ok." says Mikey, slightly relieved, then he walks out of the room into the kitchen.

Adam and Richard sigh with relief. Suddenly from the kitchen Adam hears Mikey say," Hey, cookies!"

Adam and Richard jump up from the couch, they stumble for a second, not being used to their new weight, and run into the kitchen.

" Mikey! No!" cries Adam but it is too late, Mikey has eaten...

*remember each cookie makes you gain 200 pounds*

1211111211.content:
It's too late. Adam glances at the plate. Two cookies have vanished. Suddenly, Mikey gives a sudden yelp like a dog in a trap! His clothes start ripping wide open. Adam and Richard could hardly believe their eyes. They were both 12 years old and already weighed 300 pounds each, but a nine-year-old, who weighed 400?? It was out this world!!

"What, what happened?" Mikey gasps. His huge belly sticks out so far he can't even see his feet. His flabby body is soft, warm and wobbly, like a water-balloon that was filled up with luke-warm water. Adam gives his now gigantium brother a hug. It feels weird and cool at the same time. His brother's soft body squishes against his own. It feels...strange, and yet, wonderful at the same time.

"What happened?" Mikey asked again.

"You ate fattening cookies" Adam explains, "that's how Richard and I got so fat. Don' worry Mikey. You're my kid brother, and I love you. You're one of us fat-kids now!"

Mikey laughs. "This IS kinda cool” he says. “In fact, this is WAY cool! I love this!” Mikey gives his fat brother a hug and Adam pets his brother gingerly on the head, as if he was petting a kitten or a puppy. He tries to lift his brother up, but that now waaaaay beyond the realms of possibility. They spend the next half hour wrestling with each other on the living-room floor when….

"Hungy boys? C'mon, Derek already ate one helping, and Mikey had two. His fat seems to have affected his appetite!"

Adam laughs. "Yeh, sure has mom. Richard an' I wanna go to the beach today. That okay?"

"I don't know. Look outside".

Outside, the sky's a dull, smoke-grey. Rain patters against the windows and roof as a storm rolls in. Hiding a hand underneat the table, to conceal the ring, Adam whispers 'I wish it was sunny. It wish it was a hot, 40 degrees today, so that Rich and I could go to the beach!".

The ring glows and light floods into the kitchen as the clouds part outside.

"Well, would you look at that" said Mrs. Sandler. "It's like a miracle".
"A wish come true, actually" says Adam as he and Richard head off for the beach. Adam gets his bathers, a towel and wishes up some spending-money. He dumps everything into a bag and the two blubbery friends waddle out the front door...

1211111211211.content:
When Adam and Richard arrive at the beach there isn't really many people there due to the weather being bad a couple of minutes before. After they were there for a while plenty of people began to flock until the entire beach was practically filled with people. While Adam and Richard were basking in the sun someone walks up behind them and says.

"Hey, do you mind if I sit down here?"

Adam and Richard both look up to see a kid about their age with a pretty good sized gut on him. They debate on the issue for a while and before long Adam says,

"Sure you can sit here. The beach is pretty full anyways."

The boy has a seat and makes himself comfortable before saying,

"Hi, I'm Sam. I live about 2 blocks from here, I just moved in."

"I'm Adam and he's Richard. We live about the same distance away."

"Really" Sam said "It'd be great to actually have some friends where I live for a change. I get a lot of problems with friends because they say I'm fat!"

"We won't hate you for that, just look at us!" Richard said shaking his big belly.

"I guess so, besides I like my belly, my mom worked hard to give it to me also!" Sam said jokingly.

"Your mom feed you a lot" Adam said

"Yeah" said Sam "She said she always wanted a big boy and since I'm the first boy out of 3 kids she's been feeding me and I've been growing."

"Wow, sounds pretty cool!" Said Richard

"Yeah, it is. But I would like to get bigger though." Sam said longingly

"How much bigger?" Adam asked "If you don't mind me asking."

"Oh, I'd like to be a lot bigger, I love being fat!" Sam said happily

All 3 of them lied there in the sun for about half an hour before Adam got a bit too warm and said.

"It's getting pretty warm out here why don't we all come back to my house for some snacks? Do you want to come Sam?" he asked

"Sure that would be cool, thanks a lot!" he said

They all packed their things and started walking back to Adam's house to get some snacks. They got back to Adam's house and both of the family cars were gone meaning everybody was out. They all got into the living room and Adam said.

"Make yourself at home Sam, Richard and I are gonna go get some snacks."

Adam and Richard walked into the kitchen and Adam said to Richard.

"Hey, do you think we should fatten him up a bit?"

"I don't know, he did say he liked it and that he wanted to get bigger so I guess it wouldn't do him any harm." said Richard

Adam used his ring and wished for a plate full of doughnuts that would pack 5 pounds on the eater. He went into the living room where Sam was waiting and he put the doughnuts on the table saying.

"Okay, dig in!"

Sam took a doughnut and had it done in about 10 seconds, then he went back for another and another! He had gained almost 30 pounds in a minute! Adam and Richard watched as Sam's body softened and filled out with the fat in all directions! He ate more and more doughnuts until he finally stopped after 18 doughnuts, that's a 90 pound gain! Sam's arms and legs were a lot rounder and sagging with fat, and his belly rolled over the waist of his swimming trunks and slightly parted his legs. His man-boobs got fuller and sagged more also. He was a lot bigger than he was before! As Adam was marveling at Sam's new weight, Sam said.

"Hey Adam, could I use your bathroom?"

"Sure it's upstairs, first door on your left." Adam replied.

"Thanks" Sam replied as he got up and trudged up the stairs as if not realizing he just gained 90 pounds!

Adam turned to Richard, who was equally if not more excited than Adam was about Sam's gain, and said.

"Richard, do you think we should make him bigger or leave him at this weight?"

"Make him bigger definately! Make him bigger until he realizes that he's gained weight!" Richard said excitedly.

Listening to Richard, Adam used the ring to wish up a plate full of endless doughnuts that caused a 10 pound gain each. A few minutes later Sam called down the stairs.

"Hey Adam, do you have any more doughnuts?"

"I sure do" Adam replied "Just come and get them!"

Sam came back down stairs and sat in front of the plate of doughnuts, just as he was about to eat one Adam said.

"How much do you weigh Sam?"

"I weigh 210 pounds, why?" he asked

"Just wondering" Adam replied "Now get to eating those doughnuts before they go to waste!"

Sam dug into the plate of doughnuts taking one in each hand, alternating bites. His whole body expanding with fat as he shoved more and more doughnuts into his eager mouth. Adam thought he would stop after a few doughnuts and didn't ecpect him to have such a massive appetite, he kept eating and eating and eating, while his body filled and filled and filled with pure fat. Sam was so into eating that he didn't even realize or care that he was getting fatter, he just shoved more and more food into his mouth growing huge! Adam and Richard were so absorbed with how much he was eating they didn't even realize that he weighed...

To think, you, Adam Sandler, would be helping a kid reach his life-dream. After zapping up another ten plates of doughnuts, you leave Sam to keep on eating while you and Richard move off.

You sit down at the piano. It's an old upright, but it's massive! Six feet tall, oak and mahogany, polished and engraved. It's been in the family since it was made over 170 years ago. 121111121221222212.content:
Richard and Mikey plop themselves down atop the quivering mass that is Adam, their task of feeding him done for the time being now that he’s asleep. Adam’s nearly formless body is honestly a marvel. His flab creates its own artificial horizon complete with rolling hills that are his folds of fat. If Richard and Mikey hadn’t already been right next to Alex’s face, they would have almost no way of locating it. His body is now so large that it would be more impressive for them to somehow fall off of him than not.

“I’m so tired,” Mikey said. “I want to sleep now, too.”

“Now’s not the time for that, Mikey,” Richard tells him. “Now that Adam’s sleeping, we need to get bigger again.”

“But I’m too tired to do anything,” Mikey whined.

“Don’t worry about that. The cookies will give you energy,” Richard reassured him.

Mikey gives Richard a pathetic look but reluctantly agrees to go along with his plan. Just as before they begin to eat the cookies from the never-ending plates Adam wished up. 1 turned into 2, 2 into 5, 5 into 20 and so on until they grew to the size they were before Adam wished them back. But even at 6 square blocks of fat to each of their names, they were still only a fraction of the size of Adam. Now that they were able to make headway on the distance to the edge of the wobbling blob, they made their way back to the ground where they could continue their gorging in peace. After all, they had a long way to go. On and on they continued devouring the cookies until they rivaled Adam’s size but that was not the end. No, they needed to be much bigger than him. Still they fed on the cookies, their massive amounts of fat now contouring around Adam’s lesser gargantuan body and encasing him in expanding fat on all sides. Richard and Mikey’s feeding frenzy continues until they begin to get tired from the effort of eating and fall asleep also, at about 35 square blocks each. The unfathomable amount of tonnage among the three boys shudders nonstop as they all sleep peacefully. Adam remains blissfully unaware of his best friend and little brother now encasing him in more fat than any of them ever thought imaginable. Richard and Mikey begin to stir from their slumber despite starting after Adam. They survey their handiwork, but for as far as they can see it’s just rolling waves of fat.

“We really got big,” Mikey says amazed.

“Yeah,” Richard agrees. “How long do you think he’ll sleep for? He can’t be that tired. We did all the work.”

“He always sleeps a lot,” Mikey says.

“Maybe we should eat some more,” Richard suggests. “Wait. Where did the plates go?”

“You don’t have them?” Mikey asks.

It’s at that moment when Adam begins to wake up. Richard and Mikey stop looking for the cookie plates and wait for Adam’s reaction to the situation. He opens his eyes and sees the endless rolls of fat and is very impressed.

“Wow. Richard and Mikey did a good job. I wonder where they are now,” Adam says.

“You should take another look,” Richard says.

“Who said that?” Adam asks looking around.

“Richard did!” Mikey responds.

Adam’s eyes start to fully adjust to being awake and he can just make out two tiny specks of faces atop two equally huge blobs, both bigger than him. He’s utterly outraged that they would go behind him again and get bigger than him, even after he already won. Richard and Mikey sense Adam’s frustration and are overjoyed at getting back at him. But Adam still has the ring. He’ll just wish them back and take their fat again and become even more huge. He concentrated really hard on his desire and the ring heats up and starts to glow in the process of granting the wish. The heat and light both grow extremely intense then eventually fade to nothing. Adam looks back at them and sees they and himself remain unchanged. They are just too big for the ring to work its magic on now.

You quickly wished for time around you to stop until you could decide what to do with Billie. You considered what you knew about the scrawny seven-year-old. According to your little brother Mikey, Billie was a major tattle-tale, and whenever he himself did something wrong, he would try to, often successfully, pin the blame on someone else. So not only was he a tattle-tale, he was also a liar, and a good one at that. You knew from watching Billie that he was also quite the bully. Though you could just change his memory to fit the changes you’d made, you can’t pass up the opportunity to get some justice on the little creep.

You examine the second grader. He was wearing a tucked-in, button down blue shirt, with brown cargo shorts. He had short, light brown, curly hair, and dark brown eyes. He also had a face so cherubic, you understood how some might mistake cute for kind and honest. You think back over how he has hurt your brother before…

The worst time had been at Mikey’s last birthday party sleepover, when the two had still been “friends”. You had caught sweet innocent little Billie performing the old “hand-in-warm-water” trick. What Billie hadn't realized was that Mikey had been a recovering bed-wetter, and hadn't wet for nearly two months, however it didn't take much “encouragement” for him to soak his bed through like the “old days”. You scowled darkly at the little boy frozen in time. When Mikey woke to the embarrassment of a wet bed he locked himself in his room and cried the rest of the day. Only three of his so called friends didn't laugh at him, and you knew that two of them, the twins, had only recently stopped wetting their beds themselves. Of course the same was true about a few of the boys who did laugh.

You sighed. Kids could be really cruel sometimes. The embarrassment wasn’t even the worst part. Possibly because of the humiliation, Mikey went right back to wetting his bed, and had only gotten worse since. The poor kid had to wear diapers at night now to prevent him from destroying his bed, because he wet every night, and often much more than once. He even needed to change himself in the middle of the night most of the time.

Billie definitely deserved retribution, and that was an understatement.

His parents, you knew, were somewhat obsessive over their sons’ health and kept him on a strict diet of healthy foods, he had never had anything sweet in his life. “Maybe that’s why he’s so bitter,” you say aloud to yourself. Billie was also enrolled in just about every sport a second grader can play, and his parents were obsessive about that too.

An idea popped into your head…
It was a little cruel
It was a lesson he’d never be allowed to forget
It was overkill
It was perfect

“I wish that no one will question either my weight gain, or Richard’s, or the pool, it will be as if it was always that way, and Billie will forget why he came here in the first place,” there was a blinding flash of light, and time resumed it self.

The curse you had placed on Billie took a moment to get in. At first he didn’t even realize what was happening, as a dark stain slowly spread across his shorts. Adam noticed that now, instead of being a mountain of pure blubber, he was very lean and skinny, clad only in a ratty loin cloth. It looked like a tattoo, but Adam didn't remember getting it.

He looked around to see that he was in a huge, cathedral-like room, with silver and gold tiling on the floor and walls, and magnificent arches on the ceiling, with a massive chandelier that looked the the wish ring, except massive and upside down. Warm, morning light flooded in through massive stained glass windows that depicted images of massive amounts of unhealthy foods.

At the center of the masterpiece of a building that Adam was in was a massive Turkish bed with lavish royal blue velvet and gold trimmings. Adam saw Richard sitting on that bed, wearing regal robes of royal blue that matched his bed. He was just about as skinny as Adam, but Adam had a feeling that that would soon change. On his right hand was the actual wishing ring, almost mocking Adam as it glinted in his eye.

Richard also seemed to be first discovering his surroundings, but once he found out that he was the ruler of this palace that seemed to be made specifically for him, a smug smile appeared on his face, and he simply pointed to Adam, beckoning for him to come with his index finger. Adam wanted to refuse, but soon he found himself walking towards Richard in subordination without even realizing it.

"It's my turn now, slave!" Richard said with a smile as an accompanying growl was heard from his stomach. "I'm hungry! Get me food and lots of it!" Richard demanded as Adam walked away obediently, seeming to know where to get food.

Soon, he found a massive kitchen with hundreds of other boys his age laboring over stoves, trying as hard as they could to make delicious foods as quickly as possible. They all had a sudden desire to cater to Richard's every whim.

Adam then found a massive, golden cart that had five circular platforms, each the size of a small dinner table, creating a quintuple-decker structure that was taller than Adam was. He had to reach to get anything on the top. Either way, other slaves loaded it with food, most of which was fried and high in fat and calories. Various plates of fried eggs, greasy bacon that was mostly fat, juicy sausages, pitchers upon pitchers of whole milk, and extremely buttery hash browns that looked as if they had been deep fried. Finally, there was a massive amount of doughnuts, most of which were frosted very heavily. These doughnuts took up two and a half of the five levels. "Richard must love doughnuts" Adam thought as he wondered how he would possibly be able to move the massive structure.

The weird part was that there were no plates involved. The slaves just piled foods onto the golden surface, and finally, when each platform was piled high with food, Adam tried moving it. Surprisingly, he was able to, but just barely. He had to work extremely hard to move the cart. He wanted to eat all the foods himself, but he was very afraid to, subconsciously aware that there would be massive punishment.

"Feed me!" Richard boomed as Adam finally arrived, panting from exhaustion. Once he stopped the cart in front or Richard, Richard pointed to his mouth with a smug expression, knowing that it would be torture for Adam to feed him, despite Adam's desires to get fat.

Adam grabbed a maple doughnut and shoved it in Richard's mouth. An explosion of flavors, the best Richard had ever tasted, and he moaned because of the sheer deliciousness, torturing Adam further. This continued for over an hour, and somehow, the entire massive meal disappeared down Richard's greedy gullet. Having ingested all of that food, Richard's stomach was large enough for Adam to fit into, and it rested heavily on Richard's lap, his robes split open by the massive orb of food-filled flesh.

Now that Richard was satisfied, he turned sideways so he could lay in his bed, saying, "You're lucky I'm in a good mood today!", and Adam left hopeless in his quest to get fatter. He at least enjoyed the fact that Richard was getting fatter, and he was excited to see how much larger his new ruler would get.

12122112112112222122.content:
When the light vanished and Adam could see again, he found himself back to his original size. He still had the ring on his finger. He smirked. Good. But what was this place?

Adam was standing at the far end of a MASSIVE room. It looked like four gigantic airplane hangars, or maybe eight! Who knew? Perhaps even ten. The room was luxuriously furnished with a monstrously huge bed the size eight tennis-courts at the far end. At the front of the bed was a gigantic chair made of solid gold with diamonds, rubies, emeralds and sapphires set into it. It was beautifully upholstered in only the finest red and blue silk. Adam sat down in it.

A side door into the huge central chamber creaked open. Adam looked around to his right. He could see a boy with shackles around him, come clinking towards him. He had a heavy iron collar around his skinny neck. He looked horribly starved and staggered across the exquisite heated marble flooring as if he was going to faint at any moment.

"Where am I?" Adam asked. The boy flinched so hard he looked like he was going to have an epileptic fit.

"This is earth, my lord," said the boy.
"And where am I now?" Adam asked.
"This? This your palace. My lord, master, I am Daniel. I live solely to serve you, to do as you command, as you ask. My life is entirely in your hands."

Adam grinned. "Really?" he said.
"Yes, master!" said Daniel, "But master must be hungry, I will get you something to eat."

Daniel left the room through the door he'd entered it. Adam could hear clinking, metallic noises. It was then that he noticed something in front of him. It was like a floating projector-screen. What it really was, of course, was X-ray vision. Adam was looking through solid stone walls. And what he saw made his heart jump.

Slaves.

Tens, dozens, hundreds, perhaps even thousands of starving slave-boys were being herded out of their cells by muscular teenaged guards. They were herded along an underground passage to massive kitchens! Adam watched as they started cooking his food. Sitting down in the huge throne, Adam managed to convert the throne into a comfortable recliner, simply through mindpower. Of course! he told himself, I'm a god, now. I can do whatever I want! His mind raced at the thought. Absolute, unsurpassable, godlike power to do whatever he wanted! This was going to be sweet!

Suddenly, a door opened to the left of the huge throne-room. Adam watched as dozens of slave-boys came out, pushing carts or carrying plates or bowls of food. Each one was skinny, starved and desperate-looking. Each slave-boy placed his food on a gigantic table in front of Adam, who started eating, and then stood to the side. The slaves looked desperately hungry and eyed the food, hoping, praying perhaps, that they might get to eat some.

Adam ignored them.

Adam ate and ate and ate! he'd never tasted such incredible food in his life! He could get used to this. Just eating and lazing around and having slaves do whatever he wanted. Yes, he could get very used to this...

"You can go," said Adam, noncommittally to his slaves. They trooped off, single-file, back to their cells.

After two weeks of near-constant feeding with the food-pump, Adam's weight had risen to 700 pounds. He had three wobbly chins and a huge belly that covered him down to past his knees and reached his toes when he sat up. Mobility was becoming an issue now, and Adam rarely left his bed. He had a pair of hoses attached to his dick and his asshole which pumped away his waste into a massive septic-tank which was emptied every month.

Adam could not think of a more relaxing existence. He woke up each morning to bright sunlight in his massive imperial throne-room and spent the whole day in bed, eating and sleeping and watching TV. Adam's slaves worked hard to pleasure their master in whatever way they could, doing for him, everything that he couldn't do himself, which was a lot.

Adam was busy finishing his massive lunch one afternoon, when Danny came waddling in. The dramatic increase in the slaves' diets meant that they were no-longer stick-figures and each boy now had a reasonable amount of pudge on his body.

"I trust that Master has been enjoying himself so far?" Danny asked. Adam belched loudly in response, not bothering to excuse himself in front of a slave. "Your master is pleased with your work," said Adam.

"My lord," said Danny, "I feel that it is my duty to tell you various important facts about your empire. If you have a few minutes?"

Adam nodded and Danny continued.

"As our imperial leader, the entire universe of Fat-lantis depends on your satisfaction."
"What?" Adam asked.
"I mean," said Danny, "That our universe of obese and happy children and teenagers will only prosper as long as our ruler is fed and content. Happy, fat and comfortable with his life."

Adam smirked. So if he was dissatisfied, the world would collapse... Adam turned this concept over in his mind and chuckled to himself.

"...And also as our ruler," said Danny, "As our almighty deity, the people will pray to you and hope that you will grant their wishes. Who's wishes you decide to grant, my Lord, is of course, up to you."

Adam nodded, "I see," he said, "And how do these wishes come to me?"

"Letters," said Danny. "The imperial palace has a storage-center for all letters sent to the ruler and he must read them and decide on what to do."

Adam nodded again, "And what if I decide not do something?"
"Then nothing happens," said Danny, simply. "I thought I would tell you this now, master, because this arrived today."

Danny held out an envelope.

"Read it!" Adam commanded. Danny opened it and unfolded the letter.

To his imperial majesty, Lord Adam,

We, the impoverished of your humble subjects, do write to you in unison in the hopes that you will grant our wish of cheap, temporary homeless accommodation."

"So they want homeless shelters?" Adam asked. Danny nodded, a look of pleading in his eyes. Adam let out another evil smirk, "Then they shall have their shelters. At a charge of a dollar a week to every occupant."

"Master!" said Danny, "These are the destitute, starving minions amongst your subjects, they could not possibly..."
"THEY WILL PAY UP OR THEY CAN STARVE!" Adam roared, "A dollar a week isn't hard to find!"
"Of course not, master," said Danny.

Suddenly, a projector screen slid down in front of Adam's massive throne-bed. It flickered on and Adam could see four cheap high-rise apartment-blocks surrounded by a huge concrete wall with steel gates, appear at the far end of a massive city.

"There," said Adam, "Your homeless shelters."

Danny stood there, mouth agape, and then fell to his knees, grovelling. Adam smiled. "Your grovelling pleases me." he said. Danny got up, still on his knees, "Master is generous to the poor among his subjects," said Danny, "thank you."

Adam smiled, this was fun.

Adam and Richard were scopping out their victim, there was a kid who was unpopular as not many people liked him for who he was. "Hey we should use the ring on James" Richard suggested. Adam was nervous "Are you sure? I mean that might be kind of mean the jocks pick on him, the girls pick on him..."; Richard suddenly inturupted him "We pick on him"; Adam was thinking "A weight gain spell make him gain 300 pounds would be good for him."

Wait.... what are you talking about?" Adam asked. "Dude- there he is," Richard pointed out, past the bushes where they were hiding out in. He didn't exactly have the geeky stereotypical body and most girls might have considered him cute- he was a little short, but he didn't have any glasses, he had a mess of dark brown, curly hair, and brown eyes. He wore baggy clothes that probably didn't orignally belong to him. However, he was very shy, somewhat antisocial, and was, of course, very intelligent, his topics of conversation were usually above and beyond that of any other student... and since he was different from everyone else, he got picked on.

Richard brought up a story from the third grade that demonstrated this and helped Adam remember why he didn't particularly care for Ben. "Remember, back in the third grade... at the spelling bee... I was up there and it was one of the final rounds..." "Actually, Richard, if I remember correctly, it was one of the first-" "Hey, who's telling this story?" Richard stated bitterly, "Anyway, just as I had spelt out a particularly challenging word and the teachers told me I got it correct- then that little pipsqueak Ben had to blurt out I had spelt it wrong... and they checked it and next thing I knew, I was DQed."

"But that was in the third grade" Adam replied in disbelief "You moved on"; "But my hopes and dreams of being the best at something were shattered, I cried that day," Richard said sadly, "And I want my revenge, fatten up the kid to 400 pounds right now!" ; Adam was nervous as Ben didn't do anything to them but Richard wanted the ring because of loosing at a spelling bee, "Just give me the ring"; Adam sighed in disbelief "I will fatten him up, as you will probably break the ring or atleast tarnish it."

Adam told himself he would only fatten Ben up to 250 pounds and make the gain take place over a day or two so it wouldn't appear so drastically... then again, a day would still be a very drastic timeframe to gain 150 pounds... He tried to wish, but he couldn't do it... He really didn't have anything against Ben... but then again, Ben kept on being the best at anything academic... Still, it wasn't Ben's fault he was smart- it was his own gift... Adam gulped and made his wish... if worse came to worse, he could always make him lose the extra padding, right?

Richard was thinking, "Why don't we just agree on a number, the look on your face tells me that 300 is not really a good thing," ; "I was thinking 250," Adam replied, then he asked his friend, "Should we get started?"

"Alright, a 150 pound gain I can deal with," Richard said, "300 was a bit much, I admit... you see, I've never been known as the sharpest tool in the shed, and it kind of got to me... still...." Richard said. "Okay," Adam said as he made his wish.

The gain was somewhat noticable as Bens stomach started to grow a little bit bigger, this was the start of the gain, Adam and Richard estimated that he was close to 300 pounds by sunset, Ben didn't even notice that he was slowly but surely he was going to gain weight, "You know Richard, there are going to be some weird reprucussions because of this" Adam warned "I feel bad for doing it but if that is what you want then I won't argue with you"

Ben was wearing a baggy brown shirt and it was very hard to see the gain. Ben scratched his thick, curly head of hair as he heard rustling in the bushes where Adam and Richard were. He turned his head, but then shrugged as Adam and Richard froze and he went off to the cafeteria. "Oh great..." Richard said, "Ben had lunch now." "So do we," Adam hissed, rolling his eyes and knocking Richard on the head. Richard wasn't exactly the quickest of the two. The two hopped out of the bushes and followed Ben after he had left the area.

"Are you sure he won't gain like 600 pounds after he eats while he is 'silently gaining?" Richard asked nervously ; "I am positive that there won't be six times more of him after he consumes something, but come on we are going to loose him, because it looks busy in there and I am starving" Adam replied; Richard and Adam made their way into the cafeteria, waiting in line for the vending machine. "So this is going to be really funny when the sun sets" Richard stated; "I know he is going to be huge" Adam said sarcastically "Maybe he will like his sudden gain in weight he will want to be fattened even more".; Richards face lit up with he heard Adams suggestion.

Ben prefered not to eat the cafeteria food, for health reasons. It was much better to eat a bunch of candy bars than it was to eat the mold infested salad, or of course the chili where fingers turned up frequently. Ben had gotten some chips from the vending machine, along with a pile of Milky Ways and twinkies. Sure, he ate junk food, but he had measured his metabolism before and he could tell by his calculations, he wasn't going to gain a pound. Adam and Richard watched as Ben shoved a candy bar into his mouth with a bony, pipe-cleaner like arm.

"Wow, he really needs to eat a lot of food, he is a stick," Adam grimaced "He needs like cheeseburgers and those poutine things, that have the fries smothered with cheese curds and gravy, that will fatten him up for sure" : "Or give him a heart attack" Richard joked.

As Ben finished up, disposed his many wrappers in the trash bin, he hurried off to his next class- PreCalculus. Adam and Richard were able to get a good look at him as he passed through the double doors.

Adam and Richard saw that Ben's body looked a bit heavier than before, it had looked like there was a 10 pound gain on him but in a few hours things will be much bigger for the poor kid.

info.brief_description: A magic ring allows Adam to fulfill his dreams of super-fatness Add, I need more chapters!
info.description:
Since the age of five, Adam Sandler had always wanted to be fat, and fatter. His parents loved him and encouraged him to eat and grow fat. Adam's body, however, didn't allow him to get fat! Right now, he's 12 years old, 5 feet, 6 inches. Brown hair, slightly tanned, with green eyes. When his grandmother leaves him a magic ring, all of Adam's dreams and wishes come true!

Adam's best friend Richard, is the only person, apart from his parents, that adam as told about the ring's wish-granting powers. Please note:

Any growth should be weight-gain, but height-gain and stuff like that is allowable, but keep it minimal. If you want your characters to have sex with each other, that's fine. I've noticed some guys have already started writing about that kinda stuff, so I might as well let them have their fun. Adam and Richard cannot die. Everyone else, can.

PLEASE ADD & REVIEW CHAPTERS!!!

THANKYOU!!
